themes: need for predictability and stability in funding
equity and diversity in cultural funding
importance of both 'big-tent' and culturally-specific organizations
key_phrases: value organizations that have grown and attracted diverse communities through 'big-tent' community-building
not only organization that were founded with the explicit purpose of supporting communities at risk of cultural erasure
BOTH important types of organizations to further aims of equity and diversity
barriers_identified: lack of predictability and stability in funding
limited recognition of organizations that serve diverse communities but are not explicitly founded for at-risk groups
solutions_proposed: Make funding programs more predictable and stable
Value both 'big-tent' community-building organizations and those founded to support communities at risk of cultural erasure
